definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.chinese: 心胸狭小的人道人长短。

sentences.english: There have been said to Wudang Mountain Road flyover of a skillful, often called Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 相传武当山曾有一位医术高明的道人，叫泰常。

sentences.english: As Tao cultivators , we should restrain ourselves to commit deeds that will attract negative karma.
sentences.chinese: 所以身为修道人，就要克己复礼，不要造因果。

sentences.english: Mo smiles were empty meditation, convergence will be immortal hero.
sentences.chinese: 莫笑道人空打坐，英雄收敛便神仙。

sentences.english: When cultivators of the spiritual path actually gain some accomplishment, they get it with someone's help.
sentences.chinese: 修道人的道业有所成就，是谁帮助的呢？

sentences.english: He Jie is very sober, asked where the daughter is in knows such a handyman in buddhist temple?
sentences.chinese: 何洁十分清醒，问女儿是在哪儿认识这么个道人的？

sentences.english: From the beam of an empty room your nest will fall.
sentences.chinese: 却不道人去梁空巢也倾。

sentences.english: He has his own faults, but all in all, he is an honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他有自己的缺点，但总体上看，他是一个厚道人。

sentences.english: Taoist blindly with quiet meditation, who laid off the ceiling to the eye side.
sentences.chinese: 道人一味着幽禅，谁遣天花到眼边。

sentences.english: Instead of chattering on worldly matters, we monastic practitioners ought to discuss only about the Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 修道人不谈佛法，而谈俗事，这非出家人的本分。

definition: honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Lu Yu (733-804), Chinese writer from Tang dynasty, known for his obsession with tea
